Content:: The Tour of China is an annual professional road bicycle racing stage race held in China since 1995. The race is sanctioned by the International Cycling Union (UCI) as a 2.1 category race as part of the UCI Asia Tour. Since 2012, there are two parts of the Tour of China, Tour of China I and Tour of China II. Tour of China I Tour of China II   This article about sports in the People's Republic of China is a stub.
